headline: A Look At Mondelez International (MDLZ) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: Mondelez International (MDLZ) has drawn fresh attention after a recent share move, with the stock last closing at US$61.58. Investors are weighing that price against the company’s profitability and global snack portfolio. See our latest analysis for Mondelez International. That latest move fits into a stronger recent trend, with a 1 day share price return of 2.74% and a year to date share price return of 14.78%, even though the 1 year total shareholder return is slightly negative at 1.10%...
